headline: Trying to Keep Up With Grandma’s Love Life
abstract: My grandmother was getting married for the third time — to her former brother-in-law, of all people. I didn’t expect to envy them.
lead_paragraph: Three years ago, my mother sent me a text that read, “Gramma Gert: 3, Jake: 0” — the joke being that her 80-year-old mother, Gert, was getting married for a third time while I, at 28, was still single. But the odder twist — too strange to joke about, perhaps — was that Gert’s soon-to-be-husband was her former brother-in-law, Bill.
